Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ocellatin-PT7  (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Skin Secretion, dorsal,Leptodactylus pustulatus, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide most resembles (96.9% similarity)Ocellatin-PT8.Activity:  it has leishmanicidal activity (IC50 72.8 uM). Weakly active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 60 uM), K.pneumoniae ATCC 700603 (MIC >240 uM), S.choleraesuis ATCC 14028 (MIC 240 uM), and S.aureus ATCC 29313 (MIC 240 uM).Toxicity:  No hemolysis at the MIC. Updated 10/2016.

Literature Information.Title: Characterization and Biological Activities of Ocellatin Peptides from the Skin Secretion of the Frog Leptodactylus pustulatus
